data: {"generalSituation":"The winter monsoon will affect the coast of Guangdong today and tomorrow. It will be windy. Temperatures will fall appreciably over the region and it will become cold, while the weather will improve. With the monsoon moderating slightly early next week, temperatures will rise slightly over the region but it will still be cool in the morning. Dry replenishments of the monsoon are expected to influence Guangdong persistently midweek next week. Temperatures over the region will fall again. The weather will be generally fine and very dry with rather large temperature difference between day and night.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260102","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"North force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore, up to force 7 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine and dry.
